```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
biscoe_dream_penguins <- penguins |>
  dplyr::filter(island %in% c("Biscoe", "Dream")) |>
  select(-c(year, sex)) |>
  mutate(body_mass_kg = body_mass_g / 1000) |>
  rename(location = island)
```

```{r}
adelie_penguins <- penguins |>
  dplyr::filter(species == "Adelie" & !is.na(flipper_length_mm)) |>
  group_by(sex) |>
  summarize(penguin_mean = mean(flipper_length_mm), 
            penguin_sd = sd(flipper_length_mm), 
            penguin_count = n())
```

```{r}
animals <- tibble::tribble(
  ~location,   ~species,  ~maturity,
   "lagoon",   "bobcat",    "adult",
    "bluff",   "coyote", "juvenile",
    "creek",      "fox",    "adult",
     "oaks", "squirrel", "juvenile",
    "bluff",   "bobcat",    "adult"
  )


sites <- tibble::tribble(
  ~location,      ~full_site_name, ~jurisdiction,
    "beach",       "Goleta Beach",     "SB City",
   "lagoon",        "UCSB Lagoon",        "UCSB",
    "bluff",       "Ellwood Mesa",     "SB City",
     "oaks", "Fremont Campground",        "USFS"
  )

```

```{r}
full_join_example <- full_join(animals, sites, by = "location")

left_join_example <- left_join(animals, sites)

right_join_example <- right_join(animals, sites)

inner_join_example <- inner_join(animals, sites)

semi_join_example <- semi_join(animals, sites)
#is the same as
semi_join_test <- animals |>
  filter(location %in% sites$location)

anti_join_example <- anti_join(animals, sites)
#is the same as
anti_join_test <- animals |>
  filter(!location %in% sites$location)
```

```{r}
sites <- sites |>
  rename(place = location)
test_join <- full_join(animals, sites, by = c("location" = "place"))
```

```{r}
urchin_counts <- tribble(
  ~date, ~species, ~size_mm,
  "10/3/2020", "purple", 55,
  "10/4/2020", "red", 48,
  "11/17/2020", "red", 67
)

urchin_counts <- urchin_counts |>
  mutate(date = lubridate::mdy(date)) |>
  mutate(year = year(date),
         month = month(date),
         day = day(date))

urchin_counts |>
  group_by(year) |>
  summarize(total = n())
```

```{r}
day_1 <- lubridate::ymd("2020-01-06")
day_2 <- lubridate::ymd("2020-05-18")
day_3 <- lubridate::ymd("2024-08-19")

time_interval <- interval(day_1, day_2)
time_length(time_interval, "day")
time_length(interval(day_2, day_3), "year")
```

```{r}
skywalkers <- starwars |>
  filter(str_detect(name, "Skywalker"))
```

```{r}
firewalkers <- starwars |>
  mutate(name = str_replace(name,
                            pattern = "Sky", 
                            replacement = "Fire"))
```

